sentence.Network_en: It helps to promote cross - pollination and is often combined with self - incompatibility.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种现象在许多特化的 虫媒花 中较常见,尤其是通过蜜蜂传粉的花.

sentence.Network_en: The World Cup illustrates the benefits of cross - pollination between peoples and countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 世界杯表明,民族与民族,国家与国家之间互授精华大有益处.

sentence.Network_en: A new breed. A cross - pollination between tulips and daisies.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是新品种,由郁金香和雏菊杂交而成.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 蓝莓通常无需异花授粉 (Cross-pollination) 即可结果，但如果能同时种植不同品种或栽培种时，异花授粉会结出较大的果实，且较早成 …
